column4: Class 1: both municipal water and municipal sewer; Class 2: either municipal water or municipal sewer but not both.
column10: Class 1: both municipal water and municipal sewer; Class 2: either municipal water or municipal sewer but not both; Class 3: neither municipal water nor municipal sewer.
column16: A 30-foot vegetative buffer, consisting of grass, shrubs and/or trees, shall be maintained adjacent to the shoreline
